subject: Validation Result: S08 & S09 Messaging/Delete Channel Audits

issues: Coordinator claimed 'tests pass' but unit tests have 67+ failures
findings.notes: Audit work is thorough and defects properly documented. Unit test failures are a separate concern from audit validity.

issues: Coordinator claimed 'tests pass' but unit tests have 67+ failures
findings.notes: Audit work is thorough and defects properly documented. Unit test failures are a separate concern from audit validity.

content.summary: CONDITIONAL PASS: Audit work is comprehensive and valid. Critical defects properly documented with evidence (88+30 screenshots). However, the claim that 'tests pass' is inaccurate - unit tests have 67+ failures. Recommend: 1) Fix unit tests, 2) Clarify test claims (audit vs full suite), 3) Track unit test failures separately.
content.critical_issue: Unit test suite has significant failures that contradict 'tests pass' claim. This should be tracked separately from audit work validation.
